Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $8,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while also allowing us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I trust this proposal will meet your financial considerations and make the acquisition process as smooth as possible. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
